Itemized Passive Description:
*Per Extreme Class ally on the team*
- ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 7%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 35%)
*Per "DB Saga" or "Earthlings" Category ally on the team
(depending on which Category has more members)*
- ATK & DEF 30%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Chance of evading enemy's attack 7%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 35%)
*When there is another "DB Saga" or "Earthlings" Category
ally attacking in the same turn*
- Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type to
Rainbow Ki Spheres
- ATK & DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g} and damage reduction rate 40%{passiveImg:up_g}
when attacking
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g}
*Starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle*
- {passiveImg:once}Stuns all enemies

7751.superDescription:
Causes supreme damage to enemy 
and greatly lowers DEF

Active Skill.Name: Telekinesis
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Causes ultimate damage to enemy, 
greatly lowers ATK & DEF for 1 turn 
and seals Super Attack for 1 turn; 
"DB Saga" or "Earthlings" Category allies' 
ATK +16% and DEF +27% for 1 turn 
(self excluded)
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when all allies attacking 
in the same turn are Extreme Class, 
or when facing only 1 enemy starting from 
the 5th turn from the start of battle (once only)
